page.title: 03Temple Newsam House (cont)
page.content: a major part of the estates. Part of the trail passes through a garden of rhododendron bushes. These rhododendrons are a popular part of the gardens as are the splendid rose gardens. Another major development in the estate is the construction of an amphitheatre in front of the stable block. This amphitheatre is used for band concerts, Morris Dancing and plays, the latter have icluded Twelfth Night and A Midsummer Night's Dream. These activities extremely popular and well attended. The Grounds of the House are used throughout the year for many exhibitions and shows, Ideal Homes Exhibition and Folk Concerts. Many people just come to picnic and to walk in the open air before stepping back into Industrial Leeds. Even in winter the grounds are used for sledging and ice skating.
